name: konfigyr.licencing.enabled
description: Is licencing enabled. Defaults to true.

name: konfigyr.licencing.licence-duration
description: Defines the default licence duration. Defaults to one year.

name: konfigyr.licencing.cleanup.enabled
description: Enables the licence cleanup job. Defaults to true.

name: konfigyr.licencing.cleanup.cron
description: Specifies the interval of the licence cleanup job. Defaults to every hour.
